Posts.Content: I am one of the fortunate ones whose results came back good,no cancer! Thank you to all those who wrote me and gave me support it really helped me. I also pray for all of the women who are dealing with cancer. Breast cancer took my grandmother and i saw it first hand.god bless you all stay strong.
Posts.Title: While im Waiting For my Results

Posts.Content: Please someone help me! 6 days ago i had a tumor removed first the needle localization then the surgery. I have been in so much pain from this removal of my tumor i cant sleep is this normal to hurt so bad? My breast feels like a knife is being stuck in it. I get my results tomorrow. What were your expeiences please share them with me.
Posts.Title: While im Waiting For my Results

Posts.Content: Please let me know how they remove the tumor i had mine removed 6 days ago and get my results tommorrow.
Posts.Title: Having Biopsy Confused...
